thread.title: New: LinkedIn’s Matched Audiences will target ads based on people’s web browsing, email addresses
thread.title_full: New: LinkedIn’s Matched Audiences will target ads based on people’s web browsing, email addresses

author: Tim Peterson
title: New: LinkedIn’s Matched Audiences will target ads based on people’s web browsing, email addresses
text:
LinkedIn will roll out a new ad targeting program called Matched Audiences in November, according to a leaked presentation.

Please visit Marketing Land for the full article.
